h2.style: font-size: 20px; background-color: rgb(26, 87, 168); border-bottom: 8px solid rgb(0, 72, 160); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: asapbold; margin: 0px; padding: 7px; text-align: center;

strong.span: CBRSD is Closed from March 14 - May 4 Due to COVID-19 Concerns

div.h2: Welcome to the Central Berkshire Regional School District

div.p: The Central Berkshire Regional School District has a vision that the District willprovide an inclusive educational environment for all learners to attain social, emotional and academic success.
Central Berkshire Regional School District, in partnership with the community provides a rigorous, meaningful learning environment.

div.div: Information regarding 2020-2021 Kindergarten registration is available here.
The Town of Dalton is requesting your input and opinions on its open space and recreation plan.
div.a: Read More about Dalton Open Space & Recreation Survey
Updates from the Superintendent RE: COVID-19
div.div: Per the order of Governor Baker, all Massachusetts schools will be closed from Monday, March 16 until Monday, May 4th. Click read more for additional updates.
div.a: Read More about Updates from the Superintendent RE: COVID-19
Update from the Commissioner of Education on COVID-19
div.div: The attached letter includes remote learning updates from the MA Department of Elementary and Secondary Education
div.a: Read More about Update from the Commissioner of Education on COVID-19

div.div: Information regarding learning opportunities for students during the closure.
div.a: Read More about Resources for Learning at Home

div.div: Click "read more" for the most recent update for the Wahconah Building Project
div.a: Read More about Wahconah Building Project Update

div.div: 254 Hinsdale Road, Dalton, MA 01226 | Phone (413) 684-0320 | Fax (413) 684-4088

div.em: Central Berkshire Regional School District, in accordance with its non-discrimination and zero tolerance policy, does not discriminate in its programs, activities, facilities, employment, or educational opportunities on the basis of race, color, age, disability, sex, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, homelessness, veteran status, or gender identity and does not tolerate any form of discrimination, intimidation, threat, coercion and/or harassment that insults the dignity of others by interfering with their freedom to learn and work. [M.G.L. c.76, s5]
